definition: consisting of one of two equivalent parts in value or quantity, partially or to the extent of a half, one of two equal parts of a divisible whole
details:
adjective
- consisting of one of two equivalent parts in value or quantity
- partial
- (of siblings) related through one parent only
= example: (of siblings) related through one parent only
adverb
- partially or to the extent of a half
= example: partially or to the extent of a half
noun
- one of two equal parts of a divisible whole
= example: one of two equal parts of a divisible whole
= synonyms: one-half
- one of two divisions into which some games or performances are divided: the two divisions are separated by an interval
